Term.Name: PROGRAMME IDENTIFIERS
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: UMID
Term.Definition: A unique identifier for audiovisual material which is locally created and globally unique. It doesn't depend wholly uopn a pre-registration process, but can be generated automatically at the point of material origination without reference to a central resource
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: EPID
Term.Definition: An identifier for Editorial Programme Versions issued by an organisation having the programme editorial control, according to the EBU technical specifications
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: UPID
Term.Definition: SMPTE (ATSC) UPID - A Unique Program Identifier for a programme as a Work
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: UPN
Term.Definition: British Independent Television (ITVA) Universal Programme Number. The use of this is restricted, in the main, to British Independent Television companies and associated organisations.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: USID
Term.Definition: Unambiguous identification scheme for BWF (Broadcast Wave Format) files
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Programme Number
Term.Definition: An identifying number issued by the organisation supplying the material (in this case a complete programme) and recognised by them as such.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Programme Version Number
Term.Definition: An identifying number, for a particular version of a programme, issued by the organisation supplying the material (in this case a complete programme) and recognised by them as such.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: PHYSICAL MEDIA IDENTIFIERS
Term.Definition: Organisationally given identifiers for physical media
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: TAPE IDENTIFIERS
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: IBTN
Term.Definition: EBU International Broadcast Tape Number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Tape Number
Term.Definition: Organisational Tape Number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: FILM CODES
Term.Definition: Organisationally given identifiers for film
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Reel/Roll Number
Term.Definition: An organisationally given number for a film reel or roll.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Film Header
Term.Definition: An organizationally given header for a film reel or roll.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: DISK IDENTIFIERS
Term.Definition: Organisationally given identifiers for Disks
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Magnetic Disk
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Magnetic Disk Number
Term.Definition: An organisationally given number for a magnetic disc or disc pack.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Optical Disk
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Optical Disk Number
Term.Definition: An organisationally given number for an optical disc or disc pack.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: INTERNATIONAL STANDARD IDENTIFIERS
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: CRID
Term.Definition: ETSI. Content Reference identifier. A globally unique identifier defined by TV-Anytime
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISAN / V-ISAN
Term.Definition: ISO. International Standard Audiovisual Number, ISO 16706, a unique permanent reference for each audiovisual work (not publicatiosn or broadcasts) centrally registered in the ISAN system. The versioned ISAN number allows to identify a particular version of a work (e.g. a special cut / format or particular language edition).
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISBD
Term.Definition: International Federation of Library Associations and Institutions Bibliographic Descriptor
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISBN
Term.Definition: ISO. International Standard Book Number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISCI
Term.Definition: American Association of Advertising Industries Commercial Identifier
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISMN
Term.Definition: ISO. International Standard Printed Music Number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISRC
Term.Definition: ISO. International Standard Recording Code
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISRN
Term.Definition: ISO. International Standard Report Number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISSN
Term.Definition: ISO. International Standard Serial Number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISTC
Term.Definition: ISO. International Standard Textual Work Code
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: INTERNATIONAL STANDARD BASED COMPOUND IDENTIFIERS
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: SICI
Term.Definition: ANSI/NISO Serial Item and Contribution Identifier
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: BICI
Term.Definition: ANSI/NISO Book Item and Component Identifier
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: AICI
Term.Definition: ANSI/NISO Audio-visual Item and Component Identifier
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: PII
Term.Definition: American Chemical Society Publisher Item Identifier
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: OBJECT IDENTIFIERS
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: UUID / GUID
Term.Definition: Universally Unique IDentifier / Globally Unique Identifier. Guarantees uniqueness across space and time and does not require central registration
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: LUID
Term.Definition: A 4 byte locally unique ID
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Package Name
Term.Definition: Identifies the AAF metadata object by name
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: DOI
Term.Definition: International DOI Foundation. Digital Object Identifier
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Defined Object ID
Term.Definition: The unique identifier for the item being defined.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Global Number
Term.Definition: Organizationally-given global number used to identify subjects in the image.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Clip ID
Term.Definition: Clip ID as a basic UMID. Note that the value includes the whole UMID including the first 12 UL bytes.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Extended Clip ID
Term.Definition: Clip ID as an Extended UMID. Note that the value includes the whole UMID including the first 12 UL.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Clip ID Array
Term.Definition: An ordered array of Basic UMIDs.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Package ID
Term.Definition: Identifies the Metadata Object with a a unique identifier.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: DEVICE IDENTIFIERS
Term.Definition: Unique identifiers for any device used in programme production - cameras, microphones, editing, colour grading etc
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Device Designation
Term.Definition: Identifies the "house name" of the device used in capturing or generating the essence
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Device Model
Term.Definition: Identifies the device model used in capturing or generating the essence.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Device Serial Number
Term.Definition: Alphanumeric serial number identifying the individual device
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: IEEE Device Identifier (often used as a network node identifier)
Term.Definition: Hex number identifying a device by manufacturer and device number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Device ID Type
Term.Definition: The type of identifier used to identify the device
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Device Type
Term.Definition: Device Type expressed as a common name - e.g. camera, audio tape recorder, RAM, Hard disk etc- - or as a code
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Device Asset Number
Term.Definition: Defines the asset number of the device used in capturing or generating the content
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: PLATFORM IDENTIFIERS
Term.Definition: Organisationally given identifiers for platforms, vehicles, or mounts carrying devices or sensors
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Platform Designation
Term.Definition: Identifies the generic name of the platform carrying the device used in capturing or generating the essence
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Platform Model
Term.Definition: Identifies the platform model carrying the device used in capturing or generating the essence.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Platform Serial Number
Term.Definition: Alphanumeric serial number identifying the individual platform carrying the device used in capturing or generating the essence.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: NETWORK AND STREAM IDENTIFIERS
Term.Definition: Information about channel numbering
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Channel Handle
Term.Definition: Unique number identifying a channel number in a stream
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Stream ID
Term.Definition: Organizationally given identifier that is the stream_id in ISO/IEC 13818-1 (MPEG-2 Systems)
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Transport ID
Term.Definition: Identifier that is the transport_stream_id in ISO/IEC 13818-1 (MPEG-2 Systems)
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Essence ID
Term.Definition: Essence (or its container) stream ID
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Index Stream ID
Term.Definition: Index table stream ID
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: LOCALLY UNIQUE LOCATORS
Term.Definition: Locally unique path definitions
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: MEDIA LOCATORS
Term.Definition: Local paths for a digital media, data, metadata file etc.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Local File Path
Term.Definition: The local path to a complete digital media, data, metadata... file
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Physical Media Location
Term.Definition: A Definition of the physical location of media - e.g. which archive, place, rack, shelf, position on shelf
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Track Number
Term.Definition: Specifies the intended track number in a sequences of tracks
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Track Number Batch
Term.Definition: An unordered list of Track Numbers used to link the System item element to the essence tracks used in the Content Package
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: FILM LOCATORS
Term.Definition: Location information for film
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Edge Code
Term.Definition: The edge code on the film eg. feet or frames
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Key Code
Term.Definition: Machine readable version of Frame Code
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Lnk Number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: GENERAL ORGANISATION IDENTIFIERS
Term.Definition: Unique Identifiers for Organisations
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Organisation Code
Term.Definition: The identifying Code for an organisation
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: UNIQUE IPR IDENTIFIERS
Term.Definition: Unique IDs allocated by IP Rights organisations
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: IPI (SUISA/CISAC)
Term.Definition: IP Identifiers allocated by CISAC
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Natural Person / legal entity
Term.Definition: Natural person or legal entity ID in the International Confederation of Societies of Authors and Composers(CISAC) Interested Parties system
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: AGICOA/MPAA
Term.Definition: Unique Identifiers allocated by AGICOA
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: AGICOA/MPAA Identifier
Term.Definition: The Association of International Collective Management of Audio Visual Works (AGICOA) register ID.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: MUSIC INDUSTRY IDENTIFIERS
Term.Definition: Identifiers associated with the Music Industry
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: ISWC
Term.Definition: ISO. International Standard Musical Work Code
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Recording Label
Term.Definition: Name of a publication label - e.g. United Artists, Topic
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Collection
Term.Definition: Name of a published collection - e.g. 'Sinatra Live at the Sands'
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Origin Code
Term.Definition: Code indicating the type of source of material
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Main catalogue number
Term.Definition: The main catalogue number for a recording
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Catalogue prefix number
Term.Definition: The alphanumeric prefix to the Main catalogue number
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Side number
Term.Definition: Where appropriate, the side number on which the track is recorded.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Track number
Term.Definition: The track or band number of a recording.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: URI
Term.Definition: Uniform Resource Identifier
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: URN
Term.Definition: Uniform Resource Namespace
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: URL
Term.Definition: Uniform Resource Locator
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Accounting Reference
Term.Definition: An accounting reference issued by the organisation supplying the material and used by them to identify the material being exchanged for accounting purposes.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Archive Number
Term.Definition: An identifying number issued within the organisation by the Archive supplying the material and recognised by them as such.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Commissioning Project Number
Term.Definition: An identifying number for the project (to create the material being exchanged) issued by the organisation commissioning the material and recognised by them as such.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: PMetaTransactionNumber
Term.Definition: An identifying number for the PMeta exchange issued by the sender organisation and recognised by them as such.
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Other identifiers
Term.Definition: Identifying identifiers types not in the reference list
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher

Term.Name: Other private references
Term.Definition: Organisational
Term.ChangeComment: First version after conversion of P/META into XML. First version date is version date from reference publisher
